feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping romance‑themed UI features to source files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend components.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining theme variables, dark mode, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component assembling overlays, hero illustration, romantic text, hearts, and footer.
frontend/src/features/rose-day/DreamyOve: Generates animated sparkles, dust, and bokeh particles plus a static overlay texture.
frontend/src/features/rose-day/FooterMes: Renders a glowing footer message reading “Forever Yours ❤️.”
frontend/src/features/rose-day/HeroRoseI: Shows the hero rose illustration with glow effects and floating petals.
frontend/src/features/rose-day/PetalsLay: Creates animated falling rose-petal SVG elements with randomized motion.
frontend/src/features/rose-day/RomanticC: Displays shimmering headline and subtitle romantic text.
frontend/src/features/rose-day/ScrollHea: Renders floating hearts whose quantity and opacity scale with scroll intensity.
frontend/src/features/rose-day/useScroll: Hook computing normalized scroll progress using requestAnimationFrame.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and refreshing a backend actor based on authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading stored identities and handling login states. Wraps AuthClient creation and exposes login, clear, and status helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers with custom romantic-themed colors, fonts, gradients, and typography utilities. Adds animation and style utilities for the site's dreamy aesthetic.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider. Imports global styles and renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, radii, shadows, and animations using CSS variables. Includes typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the romantic single‑page site, required assets, existing features, and design requirements. Tracks versioning, summaries, and architectural notes.
